page.title: 09St.Mary's School, St. Mary
page.content: Mr.Gibaut the Headmaster has been at St.Mary's School for 6 years and hopes to stay for about 17 more. There are 130 children placed into 6 classes. In Reception there are 23 children,in Infant 2-27,in Infant 3-18 in J1-19 inJ2/3-26 and in J4-17. All the teachers are full-time except Mrs Simon of Infant 2. Mr. Gibaut takes over when she is not there. Mr.Gibaut teaches half the day, the rest of the day he might be writing letters or making arrangements. Mr.Gibaut goes home at around 5 pm. Mr.Gibaut's plans for the future are that maybe his office will be moved and joined on to part of the school. The school plays a part in the community because Mums and people in the Parish meet each other when they take their children to school. You start school at the age of 4+ and leave after your 11th. birthday
